resources.string: SnipMe is more than an application. We create a space for tech fascinates that are connected by code.
See where you can find us:

Developing a platform where you can easily share and discover the best code is neither easy nor fast, yet we don\'t want access to ever be paid. Unfortunately, our time is not the only resource, and creating a permanent infrastructure costs money, so the support, even with the smallest amount, will allow us to pay for the domain, hosting and space for data. Maybe we\'ll even have coffee :)
Start typing to find someone you want to share your snip with.
